title: Im newish
body: Just decided to get back into lol because all the ps4 mobas are shit. Looking to actually learn how to play this time and stick around for awhile so Im hoping to find a few not to toxic people to play with over the weekend.

replies.body: If everyone put as much effort into supporting other mobs as they do complaining on league boards something might actually get accomplished tbh.
I was scared to even post for a minute after reading some of these post but I cant keep playing genesis.
haven't played it but I checked out some videos, it actually looks pretty fun...what don't you like about genesis?

Its at a weird point right now. Its fun (not as fun as paragon) but there's not enough items to really experiment with so every game you know what build your running. The targeting can be kinda dumb sometimes but its better than smite IMO.

You can add me, same name as here. I often leave the client up while I watxh videos or something so if you shoot me an invite when I am on I will join.

I don't play ranked though.
